Teachings_of_Freedom.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the Land of the Wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.
Teachings_of_Freedom.name: Teachings of Freedom

Guide_to_Freedom.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the Land of the Wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.
Guide_to_Freedom.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Freedom)
- Forsaken Rift (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Freedom.name: Guide to Freedom

Philosophies_of_Freedom.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the city of wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.
Philosophies_of_Freedom.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Freedom)
- Forsaken Rift (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Freedom.name: Philosophies of Freedom

Teachings_of_Resistance.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the Land of the Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.
Teachings_of_Resistance.name: Teachings of Resistance

Guide_to_Resistance.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.
Guide_to_Resistance.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Resistance)
- Forsaken Rift (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Resistance.name: Guide to Resistance

Philosophies_of_Resistance.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the Land of the Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.
Philosophies_of_Resistance.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Resistance)
- Forsaken Rift (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Resistance.name: Philosophies of Resistance

Teachings_of_Ballad.description:
Poetry is the soul of the Land of the Wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.
Teachings_of_Ballad.name: Teachings of Ballad

Guide_to_Ballad.description:
Poetry is the soul of the Land of the Wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.
Guide_to_Ballad.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Ballad)
- Forsaken Rift (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Ballad.name: Guide to Ballad

Philosophies_of_Ballad.description:
Poetry is the soul of the Land of the Wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas, to every corner of the world.
Philosophies_of_Ballad.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Ballad)
- Forsaken Rift (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Ballad.name: Philosophies of Ballad

Teachings_of_Prosperity.description: Prosperity is the pursuit of the land of the earth. Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, is the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, is the source of the peace and safety of the land.
Teachings_of_Prosperity.name: Teachings of Prosperity

Guide_to_Prosperity.description: Prosperity is the pursuit of the Land of the Earth. Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.
Guide_to_Prosperity.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Prosperity)
- Taishan Mansion (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Prosperity.name: Guide to Prosperity

Philosophies_of_Prosperity.description: Properity is the pursuit of the Land of the Earth. Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity, unmatched and unobtainable by any of the other nations, is all for Liyue and its children to enjoy.
Philosophies_of_Prosperity.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Prosperity)
- Taishan Mansion (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Prosperity.name: Philosophies of Prosperity

Teachings_of_Diligence.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the Land of the Earth.
Diligence is to conquer mountains and seas, pursue prosperity, golden bravery, and power with honest, hard work.
Teachings_of_Diligence.name: Teachings of Diligence

Guide_to_Diligence.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the Land of the Earth.
Industriousness is the catalyst the flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold.
It is what makes its great commercial port great.
Guide_to_Diligence.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Diligence)
- Taishan Mansion (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Diligence.name: Guide to Diligence

Philosophies_of_Diligence.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of the earth.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.
Philosophies_of_Diligence.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Diligence)
- Taishan Mansion (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Diligence.name: Philosophies of Diligence

Teachings_of_Gold.description:
Gold is the symbol of the Land of the Earth.
Gold is the blood flowing deep under the land of Liyue, is the muscles that pump Liyue's heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.
Teachings_of_Gold.name: Teachings of Gold

Guide_to_Gold.description:
Gold is the symbol of the Land of the Earth.
Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and its people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted to gold, and gold to prosperity.
Guide_to_Gold.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Gold)
- Taishan Mansion (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Gold.name: Guide to Gold

Philosophies_of_Gold.description:
Gold is the symbol of the Land of the Earth.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.
Philosophies_of_Gold.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Gold)
- Taishan Mansion (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Gold.name: Philosophies of Gold

Teachings_of_Transience.description:
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
Fleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.
Teachings_of_Transience.name: Teachings of Transience

Guide_to_Transience.description:
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
We find the greatest joys in mortal life in transient dreams, for is life itself not like the shadow of the thunder? Pursue your dreams into the clouds if you wish, and enjoy the unexpected silence of the dim lamp-lit nights.
Guide_to_Transience.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Transience)
- Violet Court (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Transience.name: Guide to Transience

Philosophies_of_Transience.description:
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?
Philosophies_of_Transience.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Transience)
- Violet Court (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Transience.name: Philosophies of Transience

Teachings_of_Elegance.description:
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance brooks no flattery, and the elegant are ever noble. They are like the sea eagles who soar on high to contend with the resounding storms. They will not cater to philistine vulgarity, as one would not cast a flower crown into the mud, staining its dignity.
Teachings_of_Elegance.name: Teachings of Elegance

Guide_to_Elegance.description:
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance shuns arrogance. The elegant are ever humble, and only by discarding vanity and sloth may one see clearly — and is there not beauty and loveliness even in the basest of appearances?
Guide_to_Elegance.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Elegance)
- Violet Court (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Elegance.name: Guide to Elegance

Philosophies_of_Elegance.description:
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance — that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.
Philosophies_of_Elegance.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Elegance)
- Violet Court (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Elegance.name: Philosophies of Elegance

Teachings_of_Light.description:
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
The ruler who claims to have perceived all forever aims to hoard celestial glory. But this vision that cannot be shared only leads people to long for it more fiercely, like moths diving into the flame.
Teachings_of_Light.name: Teachings of Light

Guide_to_Light.description:
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though the sun rays themselves should be blocked by layers upon layers of clouds, there are still those in the thunder god's land who dream of piercing that wrathful sea of lightning to pursue the glory of the divine, fearing not that they shall be cruelly struck down.
Guide_to_Light.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Light)
- Violet Court (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Light.name: Guide to Light

Philosophies_of_Light.description:
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though they must live forever on the earth, humanity will always reach for the light. Mortals will pursue and surpass, and they will never stop. A sealed eternity may, perhaps, look magnificent, but its essence is death.
Philosophies_of_Light.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Light)
- Violet Court (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Light.name: Philosophies of Light

Teachings_of_Admonition.description:
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition comes from a pure heart. Only sensible words of goodwill can express profound wisdom and free the sprout of knowledge from the shackles of arrogance.
Teachings_of_Admonition.name: Teachings of Admonition

Guide_to_Admonition.description:
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition is paired with wise thinking. Careful deliberation affords humble words a clarity that convinces the wise and enlightens the foolish. Such words allow wisdom to flow like an unobstructed river.
Guide_to_Admonition.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Admonition)
- Steeple of Ignorance (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Admonition.name: Guide to Admonition

Philosophies_of_Admonition.description:
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition is completed by good deeds. What is done confers real meaning upon what is said. When one’s mind, words, and deeds are aligned, their nourishment shall guarantee the fruition of wisdom’s tree.
Philosophies_of_Admonition.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Admonition)
- Steeple of Ignorance (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Admonition.name: Philosophies of Admonition

Teachings_of_Ingenuity.description:
Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.
Ingenuity springs forth from benevolent consideration. They say that "a poisonous tree bears no kind fruit". Similarly, ingenious nascent ideas are always born from determined and benign minds, for only they are worthy bearers of wisdom.
Teachings_of_Ingenuity.name: Teachings of Ingenuity

Guide_to_Ingenuity.description: Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom. Ingenuity sets words of integrity on the right path. One who thinks out of goodwill and in a clever and careful fashion never deviates from the path of boons. Yet one who thinks with contempt and malice shall taint their words with despicable colors.
Guide_to_Ingenuity.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Ingenuity)
- Steeple of Ignorance (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Ingenuity.name: Guide to Ingenuity

Philosophies_of_Ingenuity.description:
Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.
Ingenuity is completed by harmonious conduct. What is done completes what is thought. Wisdom blooms where the mind, words, and practice converge.
Philosophies_of_Ingenuity.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Ingenuity)
- Steeple of Ignorance (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Ingenuity.name: Philosophies of Ingenuity

Teachings_of_Praxis.description:
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes stem from an unwavering will. All wisdom is manifested through the unyielding pursuit of goodness. Where goodness is not practiced, ingenuity and eloquence wither.
Teachings_of_Praxis.name: Teachings of Praxis

Guide_to_Praxis.description:
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes validate words of honesty. Though one speaks and acts out of goodwill, one has not yet obtained wisdom. Wisdom, born from action, is a signet pressed upon honest words.
Guide_to_Praxis.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Praxis)
- Steeple of Ignorance (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Guide_to_Praxis.name: Guide to Praxis

Philosophies_of_Praxis.description:
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes bring forth the fruit of wisdom. Practice grants itself meaning, and it is only by treading a path that unites action, speech, and thought that the wise may reach perfection.
Philosophies_of_Praxis.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Praxis)
- Steeple of Ignorance (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
Philosophies_of_Praxis.name: Philosophies of Praxis

Teachings_of_Equity.description:
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.
Equity sets boundaries on rights. Without equity, the rights granted by law will be abused, and become a tool to damage our virtuous customs.
Teachings_of_Equity.obtained:
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Teachings_of_Equity.name: Teachings of Equity

Guide_to_Equity.description:
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.
Equity is the foundation upon which Fontaine was founded. Equity forms the standard of the law. If law loses the essence of equity, it will become a chessboard played for profit.
Guide_to_Equity.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Equity)
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Guide_to_Equity.name: Guide to Equity

Philosophies_of_Equity.description:
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.
Equity is the foundation upon which Fontaine was founded. Equity requires the continuous and steady support of morality and law, and morality and law constantly change based upon the invariant principle of equity.
Philosophies_of_Equity.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Equity)
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Philosophies_of_Equity.name: Philosophies of Equity

Teachings_of_Justice.description:
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.
The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Without the guidance of justice, all law is reduced to meaningless words, to be tampered with and slaughtered at a whim.
Teachings_of_Justice.obtained:
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Teachings_of_Justice.name: Teachings of Justice

Guide_to_Justice.description:
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.
The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Justice must be blind, and those who wield the sword of justice must not be led astray by their own interests or affairs.
Guide_to_Justice.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Justice)
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Guide_to_Justice.name: Guide to Justice

Philosophies_of_Justice.description:
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.
The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Justice means judgment and reconciliation, the blade of judgment arrests the actions of evil, while reconciliation maintains order.
Philosophies_of_Justice.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Justice)
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Tuesday/Friday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Philosophies_of_Justice.name: Philosophies of Justice

Teachings_of_Order.description:
The shield of the Nation of Water is order.
All law in Fontaine ultimately serves to maintain a stable order. Without order, there is chaos, and there can be no fairness in chaos.
Teachings_of_Order.obtained:
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Teachings_of_Order.name: Teachings of Order

Guide_to_Order.description:
The shield of the Nation of Water is order.
All law in Fontaine ultimately serves to maintain a stable order. Without the guarantee provided by order, justice will be reduced to unlimited violence, a weapon used by all against all.
Guide_to_Order.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Order)
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Guide_to_Order.name: Guide to Order

Philosophies_of_Order.description:
The shield of the Nation of Water is order.
All law in Fontaine ultimately serves to maintain a stable order. Equity and justice come from order, and serve order. Like the still, ripple-less surface of the waters of Fontaine, order is the cornerstone of Fontaine's existence.
Philosophies_of_Order.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Order)
- Pale Forgotten Glory (Wednesday/Saturday/Sunday)
- Parametric Transformer
- Chests
Philosophies_of_Order.name: Philosophies of Order
